name: Hepatitis B Antigen Test
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward

contains.display: Infectious agent antigen detection by immunoassay technique, (eg, enzyme immunoassay [EIA], enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay [ELISA], immunochemiluminometric assay [IMCA]) qualitative or semiquantitative, multiple-step method; hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg)

Infectious agent detection by nucleic acid (DNA or RNA); hepatitis B virus, amplified probe technique

Infectious agent genotype analysis by nucleic acid (DNA or RNA); Hepatitis B virus
